characteristic.name: Energy in a Period of Day
characteristic.description:
The Energy in a Period of Day characteristic is used to represent energy use in a period of a day.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to the Energy characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.energy}
Refer to the Time Decihour 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_decihour_8}
Refer to the Time Decihour 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_decihour_8}
